objects.specification: A flat floor panel with a smooth matte finish in neutral gray, featuring a subtle texture suggesting polished concrete ideal for an indoor exhibition space.
A container grouping four wall panels to form the booth enclosure.

children.specification: A sturdy wall panel constructed from modular white-painted segments with a matte surface finish, featuring subtle seam details and a consistent 3-meter height suitable for an exhibition booth enclosure.

objects.specification: A sleek modern generic sedan with aerodynamic body contours, metallic paint finish, realistic glass windows, detailed wheel rims, and refined LED headlight elements designed to showcase the vehicle in a showroom environment.

A contemporary information desk with a minimalist design, featuring a glossy white tabletop surface, slender brushed metal supports, integrated LED accent lighting, and clean geometric lines to complement the automotive theme.
A grouping container for display pedestals intended to showcase accessories or brochures around the booth perimeter.
A container grouping decorative hanging banners above the booth.

children.specification: A large rectangular hanging banner printed with high-resolution car-related graphics on lightweight fabric, supported by a slim frame, designed to float slightly below the ceiling and add visual branding without obstructing the view of the demonstration vehicle.

objects.specification: A container grouping ceiling-mounted lighting fixtures to illuminate the booth.
A container grouping visitor chairs next to the information desk for casual seating.

children.specification: A modern visitor chair featuring slender metal legs, a comfortable upholstered seat and backrest in dark gray fabric, ergonomic contours, and a low-profile design suited for an exhibition lounge area.
